title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.13 - Berth assignment permits; small craft applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.13 - Berth assignment permits; small craft applications

State Regulations

If a berth is desired working railroad floating
equipment, lighters, barges, floating grain elevators and other small craft on
a temporary basis, application shall be made to the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
